citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:30pm on
11-MAR-19.
The inspector was able to make contact with the Licensee's husband at the facility. He was able to confirm that no
one was available for inspection at that time.
